entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Flurries beginning early this morning and ending near noon. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
